title: New laptop
content:
Have tried so many times to transfer from old laptop to new laptop, never works. Have watch the youtube videos and followed this. Can not get it to work. Just want the emails from the old to the new laptop Thank you

Method using a transfer device On your source computer Connect a device for data transfer, either a local one such as a USB flash drive, or a remote storage drive. Click the menu button Fx57Menu, then click Help and select Troubleshooting Information. Locate the "Profile Folder" entry, then click Open Folder. Your Thunderbird profile folder will open in Windows Explorer. Close Thunderbird. From your Thunderbird profile folder in Windows Explorer, go up three levels. Right-click on the Thunderbird folder and select Copy. Right-click the device you are using to transfer your data, then select Paste. If you are using a local transfer device, remove it safely from the source computer. Note: This steps can also be used to create a backup of your Thunderbird profile folder.

On your destination computer Connect the same transfer device you have used before to copy your Thunderbird profile folder from the source computer. Right-click on the copy of the Thunderbird profile folder that you created on the transfer device, then select Copy. Open Thunderbird (Close the account setup window if it appears.) Click the menu button Fx57Menu, then click Help and select Troubleshooting Information. Locate the "Profile Folder" entry, then click Open Folder. Your Thunderbird profile folder will open in Windows Explorer. Close Thunderbird. From your Thunderbird profile folder in Windows Explorer, go up three levels. Right-click inside the folder, then select Paste. When prompted, choose to replace your current data.

title: Problems with cross-verification on matrix in Thunderbird
content:
Hello there, i use CachyOS and use Thunderbird for my mails, but recently realized that i can login into matrix chat too so i decided to use it because its pretty simple, but when i want to verify my session, i got a problems and even passcode phrase wont help

Here the logs when i start verify device ``` prpl-matrix.matrix: error while handling verification event Buffer.concat is not a function prpl-matrix.matrix: error while handling verification event Buffer.concat is not a function prpl-matrix.matrix: error while handling verification event Buffer.concat is not a function console.error: "Set favicon for page https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/search/?q=matrix&appver=145.0&platform=Linux FAILED" [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x8000ffff (NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED) [nsIFaviconService.setFaviconForPage]" nsresult: "0x8000ffff (NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED)" location: "JS frame :: resource:///modules/MailUtils.sys.mjs :: setFaviconForPage :: line 1144" data: no] ```

On phone its continiously "loading" secure check but in fact trying 3 times and cancel verification cause of failture, what i should do with it?

title: How to get Thunderbird in Macbook to Junk new email same or similar to email already marked as Junk
content:
I keep receiving the same or similar spam emails which I have already marked as Junk. I assumed that by doing so, Thunderbird would 'know' to send those directly to the Junk folder, but these emails still appear in my Inbox. How to train T'bird so that new emails I have previously marked as Junk automatically go to the Junk folder (it would then be up to me to check this folder if needed)?

I have a Macbook air, T'bird shows up to date (v. 140.5.0esr (aarch64), Junk settings: Enable adaptive junk mail controls for this account, Move new junk messages to: "Junk" folder on Local folders. Many thanks.

title: INOLTRO AUTOMATICO MAIL AD ALTRO INDIRIZZO
content: Buongiorno, in ufficio usiamo per la posta aziendale Thunderbird da diversi anni, con grande soddisfazione. Circa un mese fa ho scaricato un add on suggerito da Thunderbird per inoltrare automaticamente le mail di una banca all'indirizzo dell'amministrazione, perch√© la banca prevede un solo indirizzo di riferimento. In buona fede credevo che quel servizio funzionasse solo da quel momento in poi, invece ha cominciato ad inoltrare mail anche di oltre 1 anno fa, ancora residenti nella mia casella. Dopo diverse lamentele ho dapprima cercato di bloccare l'inoltro poi, visto che non ci riuscivo, ho proprio rimosso l'add on (non ricordo il nome), sperando che cos√¨ finisse l'inconveniente. L'ho cancellato da oltre 10 giorni, ma l'amministrazione continua a ricevere numerosissimi inoltri, per cui si sono fortemente lamentati con me. Non so pi√π cosa fare, se non riuscirete a darmi un consiglio efficace con mio immenso dispiacere sar√≤ costretto ad eliminare Thunderbird dal mio pc, sperando che cos√¨ il problema si risolva. Confidando con tutto il cuore che riuscirete a risolvermi il problema, vi auguro una buona giornata. giorgio riela
